value.value: flex items-center justify-between p-3 cursor-pointer hover:bg-[var(--bg-hover)]
flex items-center gap-2 text-xs text-[var(--text-muted)] mt-0.5

node_type.code:
Object.entries(stack.outputs).map(([key, value]) => (
{key} {value}
} size="sm" tooltip="Copy" onClick={() => navigator.clipboard.writeText(value)} />
))

state_fields.reasoning: useState hook 'expanded' maps to actor state field

patterns.name: useState_to_state
patterns.description: Convert useState hook to actor state field

patterns.description: Convert JSX element to VNode builder

patterns.name: onClick_to_message
